# Pier (Building)
## Overview
**Pier**

**Create** 22 Goods, 3 Influence, 20 Labor (930 gp)

**Rooms** 1 [[Animal Pen (Room)|Animal Pen]], 1 [[Dock (Room)|Dock]], 1 [[Office (Room)|Office]], 2 [[Storage (Room)|Storages]]

Warehouses and workshops for docking ships and handling cargo and passengers.
